price: 19. Azali kobimisa moto ya bomoyi kowuta na liwa, mpe moto ya liwa kowuta na bomoyi, mpe azali kosekwisa mabele sima ya kokufa na yango. Na lolenge wana nde bokosekwaka.
arabic: يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّ وَيُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-ḥayi wayuḥ'yī al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā wakadhālika tukh'rajūna
